argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cphsca.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | cphsca.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_cphsca | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> F = ( CCfld |`s K ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_cphlvec | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> W e. LVec ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_lvecdrng | |- ( W e. LVec -> F e. DivRing ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> F e. DivRing ) |
| 7 | 2, 3, 6 | #P_cphsubrglem | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> ( F = ( CCfld |`s K ) /\ K = ( K i^i CC ) /\ K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_simp3d | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) |
